channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google just gave a big boost to its AI spending. Why Meta and Amazon could follow.
item.description: Analysts note new tax provisions could be giving the large technology companies more flexibility to invest in chips and other AI infrastructure.

item.title: Newly built homes are cheaper than previously owned homes as builders ramp up price cuts
item.description: As home builders aggressively slash prices to boost sales, prices of newly built homes are coming down.

item.title: Social Security agrees to customer-service audit after Elizabeth Warren meets with commissioner
item.description: The Social Security Administration has come under fire for AI phone glitches, long call times and website outages.

item.title: We asked readers how they prefer their Coca-Cola. Only 2.8% chose high-fructose corn syrup over cane sugar.
item.description: Coca-Cola will soon introduce a cane-sugar version in the U.S. as an alternative offering.

item.title: Can a single retiree with average Social Security income and minimal savings live comfortably abroad?
item.description: Don’t make cost of living your only consideration

item.title: Mike Khouw on a hedging strategy with the market at record highs and some threats emerging
item.description: The options trader lays out a hedging strategy for the market using the SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust.

item.title: Sydney Sweeney sparks latest meme stock rally as American Eagle jumps
item.description: GoPro, Krispy Kreme, Opendoor Technologies and Kohl's have all drawn attention from meme stock traders this week.

item.title: Oppenheimer upgrades Spotify, sees 'longest runway' to add users through 2030
item.description: Analyst Jason Helfstein upgraded the music streaming giant to outperform from perform and set a price target that implies almost 19% upside.
